2.title: Vintage Rebranded
2.plot: Concerned that her vintage boutique shop may be seen as too high-end, Doris Raymond decides to rebrand the store's website to attract a newer and more youthful clientele. Challenges arise, and the relaunch deadline is rapidly approaching. But Doris and The Way We Wore team do not let that slow them down for a minute. Follow them as they dress burlesque artist Dita von Teese, sell design inspiration to celebrity stylist Jen Rade, and take a private studio tour with revered jeweler to the stars, Joseff of Hollywood.

6.title: From Grit to Glamor
6.plot: It's another busy week at The Way We Wore when two of Hollywood's top costume designers drop by in search of 1970s frocks for upcoming projects, including a television series from Martin Scorsese. A visit from Moschino's head designer Jeremy Scott along with a group of Woodbury University design students only adds to the activity. Even in the midst of all this action, Doris finds time to leave glamor behind for a priced-to-sell day at the Rose Bowl Flea Market.

1.title: Vintage is the New Black
1.plot: Just another day at the office as burlesque artist Dita Von Teese and "Glee's" costume designer come looking for one-of-a-kind vintage gems.

2.title: The Awards Season
2.plot: Award season brings four months of madness to Doris Raymond and her style team inside L.A.'s chic vintage clothing store.

3.title: Quest for the Holy Grail
3.plot: Hit the vintage trail with Doris Raymond on a shopping spree like no other, deep in the heart of Texas.

4.title: If This Dress Could Talk
4.plot: Discover the amazing history of the garments inside the high-end vintage clothing boutique, The Way They Wore.

5.title: The Business of Vintage
5.plot: While wooing trendsetters, educating clients, and finding a sexy dress for a star, Doris displays the style savvy that propels her success.

6.title: Vintage Fashion Hunter
6.plot: Join the bidding war as Doris Raymond heads to New York City and into a highly competitive vintage fashion auction.

imdb.plot outline: In West Hollywood, Los Angeles, Doris Raymond's vintage clothing store The Way We Wore, is bringing high fashion vintage glamor to our modern day divas. Vintage is the new black in Hollywood this Award Season, and store owner Doris Raymond is on the hunt for more 'statement pieces' to make a splash on the red carpet for her glamorous clients. Episode 1: Vintage is the New Black Episode 2: The Awards Season Episode 3: Quest for the Holy Grail Episode 4: If this Dress Could Talk Episode 5: The Business of Vintage Episode 6: Vintage Fashion Hunter.
imdb.title: L.A. Frock Stars
plot: Series is a window into the world of high-end vintage fashion. Focuses on the doyenne of Hollywood vintage, Doris Raymond, and her Los Angeles store The Way We Wore.::Anonymous

In West Hollywood, Los Angeles, Doris Raymond's vintage clothing store The Way We Wore, is bringing high fashion vintage glamor to our modern day divas. Vintage is the new black in Hollywood this Award Season, and store owner Doris Raymond is on the hunt for more 'statement pieces' to make a splash on the red carpet for her glamorous clients. Episode 1: Vintage is the New Black Episode 2: The _Awards_ (qv) Season Episode 3: Quest for the Holy Grail Episode 4: If this Dress Could Talk Episode 5: The Business of Vintage Episode 6: Vintage Fashion Hunter.::NHNZ
